summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3192, for the improvement of East 80th Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to 19th Avenue Northeast, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39381, as amended by Ordinance No. 39734, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
